Scattershot/Nemesis Enforcer/Dark One:


Scattershot watches as a few autoguns open fire on Sharpedge and Jeststorm, 
Scattershot descending a missile blast sending him plumetting into the ground.

---

Nemesis Enforcer blocked the blasts with his wings, which were badly damaged. 
 He fired off twenty-five rapid blasts at Jestorm, and 10 rapid optic blasts 
off at Jeststorm.

---

Dark One, now turned around, fired off two missiles at Sharpedge.
